description.content: When Suhani’s mother is murdered, a haunting trail of secrets unfolds - mysterious figures, hidden files, and whispers of power and betrayal. As she digs deeper, shocking truths begin to surface. Caught in a storm of lies and danger, Suhani must face the darkness, where every answer only deepens the mystery.

Sanju, a humble son of a retired teacher, is captivated by the power and success of Mahendra Singh, the village head. He join the political struggle, naïve at first, but soon learns that life’s struggles demand more than ambition. As tension brews between Triveni, a strong advocate aligned with the village leader, and the anti-establishment forces, Sanju’s heart hardens with resolve. Motivated by a desire for justice, he rallies those seeking change, stepping forward as an unlikely challenger to the long-standing rule of Mahendra Singh, ready to fight for a brighter future.
Jagannathan, a Food Safety Officer, earns enemies after closing outlets that sell adulterated food. When he dies, he possesses his lover, Jyothi, who is anosmic, to avenge his murderers.

A Manipuri Army deserter finds refuge in the Sherdukpan community of Arunachal Pradesh, only to mysteriously disappear. Decades later, he reemerges—briefly—before vanishing once more, leaving behind a trail of unanswered questions.
Subhash, an Indian Army Colonel, is sent to capture a terrorist. However, the mission becomes complicated when he discovers that the terrorists are planning a political upheaval in India.

A vibrant coming-of-age anthology that captures the dreams, chaos, and charm of Indian youth across 8 cities. Stories essaying love, friendship, deceit, & ambition — each uniquely told by India’s finest directors and makers. From the gullies of Amritsar to the coasts of Kerala, this series is a celebration of youth in all its shades.
A rush of nostalgia engulfs a travel photographer as he visits his school. However, destiny reunites him with his childhood sweetheart during a school reunion with his friends.

Madho and his father are pig farmers, of a low caste are not respected by the other villagers. One day he sees a man being respected because of his expensive coat. Determined Madho tries to acquire a coat that he cannot afford.
Indresh meets Vidhyak as Sarvesh is arrested and jailed. Meanwhile, Ankita grows furious with her in-laws over their decisions, escalating family tensions.

After years of estrangement, Antony is compelled to seek help from his former friend Thambaan, despite the deep scars of their unresolved past. As old wounds resurface and tensions simmer, the two must confront their shared history while navigating a present fraught with danger, loyalty, and redemption.
A major tragedy forces a self-centred businessman to look back at the prominent moments in his life which built the foundation for his success and thank the people who helped him.

In colonial India, a ruthless tax collector arrives in a village seeking money and women. When bold Sonbai rejects his advances, she has to take refuge in a spice factory. The villagers are ready to betray her, but the factory's loyal watchman stands guard. Watch Mirch Masala!

Sanju, a humble son of a retired teacher, is captivated by the power and success of Mahendra Singh, the village head. He join the political struggle, naïve at first, but soon learns that life’s struggles demand more than ambition. As tension brews between Triveni, a strong advocate aligned with the village leader, and the anti-establishment forces, Sanju’s heart hardens with resolve. Motivated by a desire for justice, he rallies those seeking change, stepping forward as an unlikely challenger to the long-standing rule of Mahendra Singh, ready to fight for a brighter future.

‘Jaaiye Aap Kahan Jaayenge’ explores relationships and women's toilet issues through the journey of Kishan, a Sadhu and rickshaw puller. He works to improve society while seeking his father’s respect and his teenage daughter’s love.

A photographer-duo start a studio, only to find wrong things happening right from its launch. However, their photographic assignments lead them to expose shady facts about the city's builders, municipal officers and others. The film exposes many evils through its hilarious style, which weaves into its narrative slapstick comedy, as well as epic ( Mahabharata) episodes to incisive effect.

A vibrant coming-of-age anthology that captures the dreams, chaos, and charm of Indian youth across 8 cities. Stories essaying love, friendship, deceit, & ambition — each uniquely told by India’s finest directors and makers. From the gullies of Amritsar to the coasts of Kerala, this series is a celebration of youth in all its shades.

Babuji is advised by Mr. Singh to purchase a bear from Shetty, but he declines because of his financial difficulties. Rao Sahab is interested in the bear, and Chintamani has already set up a cage. If purchased, Chandu guarantees to take care of the bear.

Madho and his father are pig farmers, of a low caste are not respected by the other villagers. One day he sees a man being respected because of his expensive coat. Determined Madho tries to acquire a coat that he cannot afford.

"The Pickle Factory" is a workplace-family drama following Mahika Khanna, a laid-off MBA graduate, who joins her grandmother's achaar business in Dehradun, navigating quirky coworkers and personal dynamics.

'Kariyatthi' is a gripping film set in Bihar, following Rani, a dark-skinned girl from an upper-caste family. She faces societal prejudice and family pressure, but her life changes after marrying Jagdish Dubey. Her untimely death leaves haunting questions, revealing painful truths.

During the fierce battle in Lanka, the mighty demon Virochak wreaks havoc until Lord Hanuman arrives in his colossal form, carrying Lord Ram and Lakshman, who together slay the demon.
From the peaks of Lanka, Malyavan observes the battle. Upon witnessing Virochak's defeat, he rushes to inform Ravan. At that time, Ravan is seen in his ten-headed form, worshiping Goddess Nikumbhila. When Ravan receives the news of the battle, he prepares to join the fight himself. However, Malyavan advises him that there's no need to intervene as long as his son Meghnad is present. Meghnad then ascends to the sky in his mystical chariot and challenges Lord Ram and Lakshman from above.

In a kingdom plagued by prophecy, a prince is cast out to save his people. Raised as the King of the Jungle, he embarks on a journey to restore his father's sight by retrieving a mystical flower from the mysterious Chandra Mukhi kingdom. Adventure, romance, and reunion await.

भारत में कितने यूट्यूबर गद्दार? ऑपरेशन सिंदूर तो बस वॉर्म अप था! पहलगाम के पीड़ित परिवार से मोदी ने क्या कहा? अमरनाथ यात्रा की सुरक्षा में 42000 जवान। गुरु अर्जन देवजी की शहीदी कहानी। रामभद्राचार्य से सेना प्रमुख के मिलने पर विवाद क्यों? देखिये डिकोड सुधीर चौधरी के साथ (30 मई 2025)

युद्ध पर पाकिस्तान की 'गैसलाइटिंग'! टीम पाकिस्तान में तुर्किए-अज़रबैजान का विश्लेषण। आपको 'महाराणा प्रताप द ग्रेट' क्यों नहीं पढ़ाया? ट्रम्प और मस्क की दोस्ती में 'धंधा' आ गया? आपके बच्चों के नाम गोलू, पप्पू, चिंटू तो नहीं? क्या है NCERT का नया टीचिंग मॉड्यूल? देखिये डिकोड सुधीर चौधरी के साथ (29 मई 2025)

list.title: DECODE: सोशल मीडिया के दौर में वीर सावरकर को भूले?

description.content: पंचकूला में सामूहिक हत्या की मिस्ट्री क्या है? अगर गरीब देशों ने चीन का कर्ज नहीं लौटाया तो क्या होगा? भारत में क्यों ट्रेंड कर रहा BSNL IS BACK, अमेरिका में पढ़ना है तो सोशल मीडिया पर बंद रखनी होगी जुबान! देखिये डिकोड सुधीर चौधरी के साथ (28 मई 2025)

list.title: DECODE: पाकिस्तानी युवाओं से मन की बात!

description.content: कल भारत के प्रधानमंत्री नरेन्द्र मोदी ने पाकिस्तान के युवाओं से अपील की कि वो अपनी सरकार और सेना से सीधे सवाल पूछें। वहीं, रक्षा मंत्रालय ने पांचवीं पीढ़ी के Made In India लड़ाकू विमान के प्रोडक्शन मॉडल को बनाने की मंज़ूरी दे दी है, जिसे सरकारी और निजी कम्पनियां दोनों मिलकर बनाएंगी। वहीं, इस साल पहली बार ऐसा हुआ है, जब कोविड के ACTIVE मामलों की संख्या 1 हज़ार के पार पहुंच गई है और पिछले एक हफ्ते में इसमें लगभग चार गुना की वृद्धि हुई है।

list.title: DECODE: भारत का दुश्मन नंबर 1 पाकिस्तान या चीन?

description.content: आज हम सबसे पहले भारत पर अमेरिका की Intelligence Report को DECODE करेंगे। ये रिपोर्ट कहती है कि भारत का दुश्मन नंबर एक पाकिस्तान नहीं बल्कि चीन है। पाकिस्तान अपने दम पर कभी भी भारतीय सेनाओं को हरा नहीं पाएगा इसलिए चीन उसे पैसा भी देता है और हथियार भी देता है। इसके अलावा पाकिस्तान, भारत पर हावी होने के लिए Nuclear, Biological, और Chemical हथियार भी विकसित कर रहा है।

list.title: DECODE: दुनिया में यहूदी और हिंदू ही निशाने पर क्यों?

description.content: आखिर क्यों हिंदू और यहूदी ही दुनिया भर में निशाने पर हैं? युद्ध में हथियारों के साथ लोगों की भी हुई लाइव टेस्टिंग? औरंगजेब नहीं शहीद दिलवर खान असली आदर्श! और 43 साल बाद बरी करने वाली न्यायिक व्यवस्था DECODE... देखिये सुधीर चौधरी के साथ (23 मई 2025)
कैसे सिंदूर बना बारूद? पहलगाम और मुर्शिदाबाद की टाइमलाइन DECODE. लोग सोना छोड़ क्यों खरीद रहे चांदी? हम क्या चाहते POK... देखिये 'डिकोड' सुधीर चौधरी के साथ (22 मई 2025)

list.title: DECODE: अगला महायुद्ध अंतरिक्ष में होगा?

description.content: क्या अगला महायुद्ध अंतरिक्ष में होगा? पाकिस्तान के फेल्ड आर्मी चीफ कैसे बने फील्ड मार्शल? क्या आप भी खा रहे हैं इंजेक्शन वाला आम? आज चाय के साथ देखिए 'डिकोड' सुधीर चौधरी के साथ (21 मई 2025)

भारत के सुपारी यूट्यूबर्स, जिन्होंने भारत को कमज़ोर करने की सुपारी ले रखी है। हरियाणा, पंजाब और उत्तर प्रदेश से अब तक कुल 13 लोगों की गिरफ्तारी हो चुकी है, जिन्होंने ऑपरेशन सिंदूर के दौरान पाकिस्तान के लिए भारत की जासूसी की। देखिये 'डिकोड' सुधीर चौधरी के साथ (20 मई 2025)

list.title: DECODE: पाकिस्तान के लिए जासूसी करने वाले यूट्यूबर कौन?

description.content: जयहिंद VS जयचंद की विचारधारा DECODE. कूटनीतिक युद्ध में नकल से भी हारेगा पाकिस्तान! जब पाक सेना ने दागी स्वर्ण मंदिर पर मिसाइलें! और नए पोप लियो की शपथ क्यों देखनी ज़रूरी है? देखें डिकोड सुधीर चौधरी के साथ (19 मई 2025)
बलूचिस्तान विद्रोह का DECODE, तुर्किये-पाक दोस्ती का विश्लेषण और ट्रम्प को गिफ्ट में 3400 करोड़ का प्लेन, देखिये डिकोड सुधीर चौधरी के साथ (16 मई 2025)
One year after Professor X and Jean Grey vanish in an explosion, Wolverine works to reform the X-men.

Bheem and team are traveling by boat when they get lost and flow downstream to an unknown village. When they buy some fruit, the bill comes to nine rupees. But they don’t have change so they pay a ten rupee note. They are accused of cheating and fraud since the people insist 9 rupees is more than ten rupees. Eventually they get arrested and put into a pagal-khana. To add to their surprise, the people inside appear to be all rational, normal people. Through them they learn that almost the entire population of the village, now called Pagalpur, is mad. Some miners who are mining gold from the village by keeping the villagers mad and intoxicated with the help of a plant. Bheem and team have a plan where they pretend to be mad so as to be released from the madhouse and fight the goons, restoring everything to normalcy
A heartwarming tale of a reformed criminal who, after becoming a father of twins, faces a shocking twist when one of his babies is kidnapped. A desperate chase ensues, filled with suspense and hope.

Darwin is tidying up the treehouse, but Newts is causing a real mess and upsetting Burpee, who decides to head to the big swamp to see his frog friend Croakette. Can Darwin and Newts save Burpee in time? Watch out for the full episode.

list.title: Krish Trish and Baltiboy: Bharat Hain Hum

description.content: India has been attacked by so many foreign invaders for its riches. We had to fight so many battles till we eventually won our freedom from the British on 15th of August, 1947. The iconic trio Krish, Trish and Baltiboy present the stories about the heroes who fought the war of freedom. This series attempts to bring alive glorious tales of valour and sacrifice using the medium of animation.
Foto, an imaginative 11-year-old boy, finds inspiration in a visiting film crew, blurring the lines between reality and fantasy.

Tenali Raman recalls his past on the occasion of a grand feast hosted by the king. He reveals how a Sanyasi led him and his favorite cat Sundari to seek the blessings of Kali. How he tricks the Goddess to kali granting him the boons of wealth and wisdom forms the crux of the first part.

The Elders assign the Guardians to guard the Glove of the North in the Magic Fort. Amkko and Koto attack the fort with a Rock-Eating Mutant. The Guardians manage (eventually) to transform into the Dragon, Panther, and Rodent Warriors to drive them off.

The film “Nandu Ka Raja” tells the story of a boy named Nandu from a small village who dreams of meeting the President, Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam. Inspired by a retired army Subedar, he aspires to join the army, believing it will bring him closer to his king.

MewMew the black bunny gets a new stopwatch and wants to break his running speed record. His constant running bothers everyone, so he promises to stop if he breaks the record. Everyone is invited to witness it, but MewMew expects them to hurry up and be on time. DeeDee casts a magic spell to help MewMew break the record, but it causes unexpected trouble. Now, everyone must work together to fix the chaos caused by the spell.
When Piper make friendship bracelets for Paloma, Casey and herself, the horse feel left out. The riders learn that best friends means riders and horses, together!

Babuji is advised by Mr. Singh to purchase a bear from Shetty, but he declines because of his financial difficulties. Rao Sahab is interested in the bear, and Chintamani has already set up a cage. If purchased, Chandu guarantees to take care of the bear.

Laxmi asks Raj to stay home since guests are coming to arrange Gullu's marriage. They coach Gullu on how to behave, but Gullu accidentally sends food dishes to the hospital instead of the Dish antenna.

A teenage girl discovers her estranged, alcoholic father, a renowned singer, and defies family opposition to save him. Through unconditional love and care, she helps him overcome addiction and reclaim his singing career.

The episode sets the stage for the struggles and aspirations of the middle-class family. We meet other key family members, including the father, who represents traditional values, and the children, who embody the hopes and dreams of the next generation.
Byomkesh Bakshi wanted to assist the police to  solve the murder case in Chinatown. He looks into the matter and detects the murderers.

Shrimaan Shrimati is a legendary comedy sitcom about two middle-aged men, Keshav and Dilruba, who are infatuated with each other's wives, leading to hilarious situations as they try to impress them, while their wives outsmart them at every turn.
The story begins with the harrowing events of Partition, as the main family flees to India, facing loss and chaos. This sets the stage for their struggle to rebuild their lives.

Young officers arrive at the Commando School. Old friends meet. Abhimanyu Rai is one of them. The General gives a pep talk. Major Narayanan gets tough. A 2-mile race brings buddies closer. Vikram Rai beats up the three of them and Abhi confesses Vikram is his elder brother.

In ancient India, visionary strategist Chanakya sets out to overthrow the ruthless King Dhanananda. With unwavering resolve, he mentors the young Chandragupta Maurya, laying the foundation for the mighty Maurya Empire. A powerful tale of ambition, intellect, and the relentless pursuit of a better future.
Nikita, Nivedita, and Ila, three young girls, want to join the Indian forces. They kept this a secret from their parents. Nikita's father, Col. Arun Sachdev, refused to allow her to join the Navy.

list.title: Tehreer – Munshi Prem Chand Ki - Godaan

description.content: Huri, a kind-hearted villager, faces a tough choice: find a wife for his neighbor Bhola to earn a cow for his family.
I never saw being an outsider as a barrier; this was always my world. - Shah Rukh Khan

list.title: India on World Studio Map (Aamir Khan)

description.content: Only two per cent of the population in our country, which is recognised as a film-loving country, watches our biggest hits in theatres. Where is the rest — 98 per cent? - Aamir Khan
Even Steven Spielberg is watching our Hindi films. He watched 3 Idiots—I didn’t need to act in an English film for him to see me. That’s a moment for us. - Kareena Kapoor

Join Shraddha Kapoor at the WAVES Summit 2025 as she delves into the shifting preferences, emerging platforms, and digital behaviors of Gen-Z audiences. Special guest Adam Mosseri, Head of Instagram, will also be joining the conversation.
Don’t be a character in someone else’s story. Write your own. Passion takes you only so far, and never underestimate the value of discipline. - Farhan Akhtar

At WAVES 2025, leading voices from the OTT industry gathered to explore the future of digital entertainment in India. Sh. Gaurav Dwivedi, CEO of Prasar Bharati, delivered an inspiring keynote, tracing the evolution of Indian storytelling from radio to television and now to digital platforms. He emphasized that WAVES OTT is not just an entertainment platform but a powerful tool for empowerment.

At the WAVES Summit 2025, Madhya Pradesh takes centre stage as India’s emerging creative hub! Join leading producers like Ekta Kapoor as they explore the state’s rising potential in film, OTT, and digital content production. The session will highlight the power of regional storytelling, expanding infrastructure, and why Madhya Pradesh is fast becoming a hotspot for the entertainment industry.

Some talent was there with me. Slowly, my passion for acting developed, and I decided to pursue it as a career. I wanted to hit the bull’s-eye and showcase my abilities to become a star. - Chiranjeevi
There’s a thin line between art house and commercial cinema. They’re closely intertwined… Even art films have entertainment value, and entertainment has art in it. - Mohanlal
India is not just a nation—it’s a civilization of stories, where storytelling is a way of life. - Mukesh Ambani
She wasn’t a trained actress. She was more instinctive, more spontaneous, and deeply connected to the spirit of the character. - Ketan Mehta, Director

list.title: Indian Culture to the World (Nita Ambani)

description.content: In a world racing towards AI, let’s not forget the wisdom of Ancient Intelligence…where progress is driven not just by power, but by purpose. - Nita Ambani

list.title: Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology
Department of Economic Affairs Ministry of Finance

description.content: A photographer-duo start a studio, only to find wrong things happening right from its launch. However, their photographic assignments lead them to expose shady facts about the city's builders, municipal officers and others. The film exposes many evils through its hilarious style, which weaves into its narrative slapstick comedy, as well as epic ( Mahabharata) episodes to incisive effect.

Young bachelor Manik Mulla, a railway mail service employee, lives in an old part of Allahabad. His friends often gather at his house to listen to his realistic, surrealistic, and moralistic stories, which spark polemical discussions on various social, political, and literary topics. The film offers an intriguing study of how a piece of literature is transformed into a cinematic work that reflects multiple aspects of life.

Sultana, a small-town prostitute and her pimp Khudabaksh migrate to the metropolis; bringing with them their dreams and meagre belongings. Sultana goes about her bright and artful seductions but somehow misses her targets. Her business collapses. Desperately, Khudabaksh too tries his hand at many jobs but is unsuccessful. Sultana’s loneliness and despair get objectified in her desire for a ‘salwaar’ that she needs to complete her black ensemble for the observance of mourning for Moharram

Salim, the young man with a limp, inhabits a twilight zone. On one level, he belongs to a respectable and proud, yet desperately poor, family. His roots run deep in this congested, impoverished Muslim neighborhood. But Salim has also discovered another world—a world of deceptive charm and fatal allure—organized crime, where a little intimidation, the flash of a knife, and unspoken threats of concrete ‘mob’ action bring in quick, easy money. The tears and the price to be paid come later.

Ten-year-old Krishna is a street dweller in Bombay. He finds many strugglers like him on the street, his only abode. Krishna experiences sorrows and joys of life for himself; and those who have seen only miseries, he sees them transforming into different human beings.

In colonial India, an all-powerful tax collector rides into a rural village with his troop of soldiers. They're here for the village's money and women. The tax collector has his eye on feisty Sonbai , but, when she publicly rejects his advances, she must hide out in the local spice factory. The terrified villagers would be all too happy to sacrifice Sonbai to spare themselves, but the factory's principled watchman, Abu , guards her valiantly.

Banarasi Jasoos (2017) is a children's detective film set in the holy city of Varanasi. The story follows a young detective, Rhea Sharma, as she investigates the theft of Saint Tulsidas's holy wooden footwear, navigating a web of suspects to recover the artifact and restore peace.

Binni, taunted for being unmarried at 30, begins to doubt her worth. As the town battles a severe drought, an outsider arrives, bringing hope and also rekindling Binni's spirit, helping her embrace her true self.

The film spans 56 out of Gandhi's 79 years. It starts with his days in South Africa, where Gandhi is seen as a young attorney, who is thrown out of a first class compartment in spite of having a valid ticket. Angered at this humiliation, Gandhi decides to protest for the rights of Indians and other coloured people. It is here that he meets with his first success. His fame spreads to India and he is invited to return home to take part in the freedom struggle. On arrival, he is shocked at the poverty in the country and undertakes to travel all over the country to witness, at first hand, the atrocities of the British Empire. Gandhi's struggle to win freedom for India through his non-violent approach, his belief that men are more good than evil and his spiritual ideas all form a part of this saga, the biography of a fascinating world leader--both spiritual and political.
Foto, an imaginative 11-year-old boy, finds inspiration in a visiting film crew, blurring the lines between reality and fantasy.
A heartwarming tale of a reformed criminal who, after becoming a father of twins, faces a shocking twist when one of his babies is kidnapped. A desperate chase ensues, filled with suspense and hope.

Sanju, a humble son of a retired teacher, is captivated by the power and success of Mahendra Singh, the village head. He join the political struggle, naïve at first, but soon learns that life’s struggles demand more than ambition. As tension brews between Triveni, a strong advocate aligned with the village leader, and the anti-establishment forces, Sanju’s heart hardens with resolve. Motivated by a desire for justice, he rallies those seeking change, stepping forward as an unlikely challenger to the long-standing rule of Mahendra Singh, ready to fight for a brighter future.
Elite sniper Li Beiming is assigned to protect a high-profile target, but when he crosses paths with the enigmatic An Ying, his mission and heart are put to the test.

The Golden Horde, a rising empire under the ruthless Khan Batu, faces its first true test when the warrior Aldar distinguishes himself in battle against the rebellious Kipchak tribe. However, as Aldar earns the khan's favor, the Kipchak leader, Kurultai, vows to seek vengeance- setting the stage for a bloody feud.
Haniya agrees to marry Huzaifa. The next day, Shahryar finds out about their arranged marriage, which causes confusion and tension between them.

Shrimaan Shrimati is a legendary comedy sitcom about two middle-aged men, Keshav and Dilruba, who are infatuated with each other's wives, leading to hilarious situations as they try to impress them, while their wives outsmart them at every turn.

"The Pickle Factory" is a workplace-family drama following Mahika Khanna, a laid-off MBA graduate, who joins her grandmother's achaar business in Dehradun, navigating quirky coworkers and personal dynamics.

Habba Khatoon, known as 'Zoon' for her beauty, is revered in Kashmiri literature. A peasant girl, she learned to read and write, later marrying Yousuf Shah, who became king. After his imprisonment by Akbar, she spent her final days singing, with her poems still beloved in Kashmir today.

Tere Ghar Ke Saamne' is a hilarious comedy show that revolves around two neighboring families living in opposite homes. With a perfect blend of wit and humor, this show explores the comical dynamics that arise from their mutual dislike for each other.
This episode mocks the laughable ways of Senior officers. How all employees and resources are directed towards finding the boss’s dog in order to persuay him for their own selfish ends.
When the wanted criminal Munna Singh came to India, the police conspire against him and his family wanted to protect him. It was a three-way battle between Munna Singh, the police and his family.

Epi-01

Gaadhi, Vishwarath's father, anoints him as the future King. After a war, he arrives at Vashishtha's ashram with his army. He discovers the existence of the holy cow Nandini after experiencing the ashram's exquisite hospitality. When a famine befalls his realm, he seeks advice from Vashishtha to obtain the Nandini cow, but the latter declines.

Three women search for their own identities in a world dominated by men. Anu wants to become a flight attendant and see the world. Nashi, however, feels stuck in her marriage and routine life because her husband doesn't support her.
This episode lays the groundwork for character development, showcasing their relationships and the impact of city life on their dreams and dilemmas.
Pari tops her exam, making her parents proud. She wants to move to Mumbai for acting, but her mom resists. Eventually, her parents agree, with the condition that she pursue an MBA if acting fails.
One night, two people, a simple romance... until a secret revealed itself and made a strange turn.
This mystery drama centres on a writer who is trying to cope with the collapse of his career. Just when he thought his life was of no use, in a mysterious turn of events a girl came in aid to him.
Jagjeet marries Chann and moves to Canada, but soon after, he stops contacting her. Left alone in India, Chann falls into depression and takes a drastic step.

This episode delves into themes of love, betrayal, and the complexities of human emotions. Tensions rise as Radha confronts her fears and insecurities, leading to pivotal moments that impact her journey significantly​.

Coral Reef, which inhibits the largest set of flora and fauna, is known for its interspecies mutual relationship. But human-induced pollution has caused great damage to it, and the rain forest of oceans seems to be moving towards extinction.

Explore the remnants of a legend as Akshay Vinod Shukla journeys from Rameswaram to Sri Lanka’s eight mysterious islands—believed to be the remains of Ram Sethu. Through myth, history, and stunning landscapes, uncover the story of a bridge where devotion meets disappearing stone.

He join the political struggle, naïve at first, but soon learns that life’s struggles demand more than ambition. As tension brews between Triveni, a strong advocate aligned with the village leader, and the anti-establishment forces, Sanju’s heart hardens with resolve. Motivated by a desire for justice, he rallies those seeking change, stepping forward as an unlikely challenger to the long-standing rule of Mahendra Singh, ready to fight for a brighter future.

A vibrant coming-of-age anthology that captures the dreams, chaos, and charm of Indian youth across 8 cities. Stories essaying love, friendship, deceit, & ambition — each uniquely told by India’s finest directors and makers. From the gullies of Amritsar to the coasts of Kerala, this series is a celebration of youth in all its shades.

When Suhani’s mother is murdered, a haunting trail of secrets unfolds - mysterious figures, hidden files, and whispers of power and betrayal. As she digs deeper, shocking truths begin to surface. Caught in a storm of lies and danger, Suhani must face the darkness, where every answer only deepens the mystery.

In 'Battle of Bands', five exceptional bands—Soul of Sufi, MH43, Khyapa & Collective, Ram Trio, Sufiyat with farheen go head-to-head for the top spot. With judges Ms. Shraddha & Raja Hasan offering their expert critiques, the competition heats up. Who will steal the spotlight and take home the win? Tune in to find out!

"The Pickle Factory" is a workplace-family drama following Mahika Khanna, a laid-off MBA graduate, who joins her grandmother's achaar business in Dehradun, navigating quirky coworkers and personal dynamics.

'Sasural Jhunki Ka..' is based on the life of Jhunki,a little girl from the heartland of Bihar, who was deprived of her mother's love and was brought up under the pampering of her father Mangal Singh..!

This series portrays some important issues present in the society, like discrimination between girls and boys,
status of a woman after divorce and problems like discrimination against women have been analyzed in depth..!

Jhunki's struggle show's How a girl has to fight with her own family & the society while making her place within the society.

‘ससुराल झुनकी का..’ कहानी बिहार के हार्टलैंड से एक छोटी सी लडकी झुनकी के जीवन पर आधारित है, जिसे अपनी मॉं के प्यार से वंचित रहकर, पिता मंगल सिंह के लाड-प्यार में पाला गया..! 

कहानी में समाज में मौजूद कुछ महत्वपूर्ण मुद्दों, जैसे लडकियों और लडकों के बीच भेदभाव, तलाक के बाद एक महिला की स्थिती, और महिला के साथ भेदभाव जैसी समस्याओं का गहराई से विश्लेषण किया गया है..! 

झुनकी का संघर्ष दर्शाता है कि कैसे एक लडकी को समाज के भीतर अपनी जगह बनाने के लिए न केवल अपने घरवालों से, बल्कि समाज से भी लडाई करनी पडती है..!

At a young age, Jhunki is forced into a marriage against her will, which makes her unhappy. Her husband doesn't live up to her expectations, and in frustration, she gets out of the car and calls her father to express her anger. Her father tries to console her, explaining that her husband is a gem at heart. Meanwhile, the family members are busy preparing to welcome her, but Jhunki is determined not to go to her in-laws' house under any circumstances.

झुनकी की कम उम्र में, उसकी मर्ज़ी के खिलाफ शादी कर दी जाती है, जिससे वह नाखुश है। उसका पति उसकी उम्मीदों पर खरा नहीं उतरता, और गुस्से में वह गाड़ी से उतरकर पिता को फोन कर अपनी नाराजगी जताती है। पिता उसे समझाने की कोशिश करते हैं कि उसका पति दिल का हीरा है। दूसरी ओर, परिवार वाले झुनकी के स्वागत की तैयारियों में जुटे होते हैं, लेकिन झुनकी किसी भी हाल में ससुराल नहीं जाना चाहती है ।

Sanduk is a gripping, multi-layered drama that revolves around a mysterious chest, the Sanduk, which is said to hold the power to fulfil one's deepest desires. The film follows a complex narrative set against a backdrop of war and human greed. At its core is a tale of a soldier who, during World War I, makes a fateful decision that alters the course of history. As the story unfolds, we see the impact of this decision through the lives of various characters, each driven by their own desires and ambitions. The film intricately explores themes of morality, compassion, and the insatiable nature of human desires. With unexpected twists, deep character exploration, and a rich, immersive visual style, 'Sanduk' presents a fresh and thought-provoking take on the nature of greed and the consequences of our choices.

This heartwarming family drama explores the complexities of love and relationships. It beautifully captures the evolving dynamics within the family as they navigate modern ambitions and traditional values. The film celebrates life's bittersweet moments with melodious music.
It is the story of uniting all the princely states after freedom of india by Sardar Patel.

Rajkumar Nagpal, a work-from-home dad, moves with his wife Devayani and their children, Sanjana and Aditya, from Delhi to Jhansi following Devayani’s job transfer. As they settle into their new home, the neighbors find Rajkumar’s role unusual, which leads to misunderstandings and tension. The family navigates these changes, dealing with challenges from their community and their own personal struggles, as they adapt to their new life.

During Mann Ki Baat, PM Narendra Modi paid tribute to Major Dhyanchand and spoke about our Olympians, who have made the country proud on the world stage. He applauded the country? youth for their ability to take risks and move ahead. The PM highlighted the efforts of our skilled manpower and paid tributes to Bhagwaan Vishwakarma.

Narendra Modi's leadership after the 2001 Gujarat earthquake focused on rapid rehabilitation, empowering officials for independent decision-making, promoting development in water management and urban sectors, and addressing public concerns. His responsive and progressive governance transformed the state, ensuring resilience and long-term growth.

In the 8th edition of "Pariksha Pe Charcha," Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modi spoke with students about the importance of nutritious food, leadership, teamwork, and holistic development. He offered advice on managing time, combating depression, and allowing children to follow their interests. He also emphasized meditation for stress management and led students in planting trees at Sundar Nursery, creating an inspiring and enriching experience for all.
'Man-Eaters' explores the conflict between humans and nature, showing the dangers and chaos that result when mankind disrupts the natural order.

Geopolitics in the Indo-Pacific region & Indian Ocean is shaping India's diplomacy and defence dynamics. QUAD enhancing maritime cooperation, establishing peaceful environment, & a safe international sea routes amid challenges from China's naval expansion.

An anchor-led investigative series that delves deep into the world of digital crime. Each episode uncovers real-life stories of hacking, identity theft, online fraud, data breaches, and more. The show combines interviews with victims, cyber security professionals, and law enforcement, offering viewers a detailed look at the tactics used by cyber criminals and the innovative methods being employed to stop them.
US-China tensions escalate after US deploys Typhon Missile system in Philippines, Terror attacks in Mali- a country in West Africa, Mexico blames US for Sinaloa violence.

The Padma Shri recognized various artists, including Gujarat's puppet artist Mahipat Kavi, Madhya Pradesh's Bega art painter Jodhaiya Bai, and Nagaland's weaver Nihunyo Sohiryo. Also honored were Andhra Pradesh's Harikatha exponent Kota Sachchitanand Shastri and the Parmars, a couple celebrated for their tribal doll art from Madhya Pradesh.

'Pariksha Pe Charcha 2018' is a conversation between PM Modi and students, teachers, and parents. Modi encouraged students to stay positive, focus on learning, manage stress, and work hard rather than worry about results.

list.title: Annapurna College of Film and Media

description.content:
Carrom Live brings the classic Carrom board game to life. Experience the thrill of playing carrom with this easy-to-play online multiplayer carrom game!

With its simple yet addictive gameplay, Carrom Live is a physics-based online carrom game that offers a gaming experience that's easy to pick up but difficult to master.
If you're new to the game, don't worry - mastering carrom is easy and fun. The gameplay is to strategically flick the striker to put the pucks into the pockets.

Compete against players worldwide in two thrilling multiplayer game modes: Disc Pool and Freestyle.

Disc Pool - In Disc Pool mode, you need to shoot only your allotted color carrom pucks into the pockets to win the match. There is no 'Queen' puck in this mode. Simply, strategize your shots to pocket all your carrom discs before your opponent does. You lose your turn if you pot the sticker. You let the opponent earn points on potting his/her puck.

Freestyle - In Freestyle mode, you need to hit all the pucks and achieve the target score to win the match. The scoring system is as follows: +10 for pocketing the black disc, +20 for the white disc, and +50 for the Queen. The target score to win is 120. You lose your puck points if you pot the striker and that puck is returned to the board as a penalty. Also, the Queen has to be covered by the other puck. It's a foul if you pocket the final puck before covering the queen.

In Carrom Live, players can personalize their gaming experience by purchasing their favorite pucks, stickers, and boards using coins earned through gameplay. As a new user, you get 300 coins. There is also a daily reward of 400 coins after every 24 hours.

So, are you up for the career challenge?
Let's flick those pucks, aim for the pockets, and see who's the champ! Enjoy the real Carrom board game and become the Carrom master with Carrom Live!

A game on Lord Krishna. We all know the childhood miracles of Lord Krishna. It's a Janmashtami season and let's knock down Dahi handi on this holy occasion. Krishna Jump is a very cute game on Krishan Ji that comes up with cute graphics and lovely sound effects. Lead the little Lord Krishna towards his target by jumping on the next platform without losing your balance. To give you a desirable feel of Janmashtami, we have added 5 beautiful themes and pleasant sounds in it. After breaking each Dahi Handi, the theme gets changed. Be the little Krishna and try to break maximum Dahi Handi's. Another good way to celebrate this beautiful Indian festival ```Janmashtami```.

Play super addictive game "Crazy Balls". Just hold, drag and release the bouncing balls to shoot all shapes. Every shape has some numbers. So to destroy the shape you have to hit the shape till 0.
It's an endless game. So make a high score and be on top of the leaderboard.

Do you want to be a fruit chef? Then this game is for you! Fruit Chef is an addictive fruit-cutting game with eye-pleasing graphics and amazing sound effects. Hone your cutting skills by chopping delicious fruits such as pineapple, apple, orange, watermelon, etc. But remember, not to strike the bombs! Make your game even more thrilling by enjoying these 3 special powers- 1- Clock Power- Hit the timer to slow down the speed of the fruits. Now slice them with ease. 2- Magnet Power- Utilize the magnet power to attract all the fruits on the screen altogether and cut them in one slice. 3- Capsule Power- Get a chance to cut a lot of fruits that appear on the screen. Chop them all and increase your score. So, what are you waiting for? Let your cutlery skills get you the 'Fruit Chef' tag today!

ONU Live is a classic card multiplayer game that offers endless entertainment for players of all ages.

ONU Live comes with a twist. In this strategy card game, the goal is to be the first player to empty their hand of cards before the countdown timer reaches zero. Match your card with the top card of the pile by either color, number, or symbol. But watch out for special action cards like Skip, Reverse, Draw Two, Wild card, and Draw Four which can turn the tide of the game in an instant! You get 15 seconds for your turn.

Check out the ‘Rules’ section if you are not aware of the gameplay of ONU game.

What’s the twist then? There are two ways to win this ONU game. Either you finish your cards before the time limit i.e. five minutes or score the lowest to win. The fewer the points, the higher the rank! But how do you calculate your score?

Each card in all the color categories has a score of its face value. You will get a score on the total of the face value of the remaining cards. If your score count is less than your competitor, you will win the game. Hence, ensure that you discard higher point cards first. If you are done with your cards before the time, your score will be zero as there are no remaining cards at hand and you will be at the highest rank. Conversely, if any player leaves the game in the middle, he/she will be scored the highest i.e. 2000 points and the lowest rank.

There are 3 modes of play – 2 Players, 3 Players, and 4 Players. Select whichever you would like to play and strategize to win this endless fun card game.

So grab your cards, choose your strategy, and play "ONU Live"

Experience the Tetris game like never before with the "Aqua Blocks".
Aqua Blocks is an ultimate casual puzzle game that comes up with cute water graphics and lovely sound effects.

The goal is to create a vertical or horizontal line of blocks. Drag and drop the blocks in the right place to fit them.
Three different shapes will see at a time to make up the shape placement in your mind.

For your help, you also get an Aqua Power which helps you to remove a horizontally and vertically block line from the board. Just tap on the power to use it.

Strategically places all the blocks because no space left will lead you to game over.
Clear more and more lines to make good scores.

Aqua Blocks is the game that can keep the casual gamers entertained for hours.

Basket Champ is a single tap-based game that comes with some amazing graphics. The game theme gets changed on clearing of 5 levels.

You need to tap on the screen to hit the ball towards the basket. At first look, the game can look very easy and simple to you but trust me it's not that much easy. 

You should have some patience to dunk the ball in the basket as you will face challenges to do it.

Don't let the bouncy ball go down otherwise you will be kicked out of the game.

Be ready with your flippers and show some basketball skills to dunk balls in the basket to become the next basketball star!

Are you a die-heart football fan? Then you can't miss playing Football Stars!

Football Stars is a challenging soccer game with enticing graphics and pleasant sounds where the player needs to score more goals than the opponent to win matches.

In this fun-to-play game, you will be playing a football match against your opponent. You will get 90 seconds for a single match in which you need to make as many goals as you can to beat the opponent.

If you are playing on mobile phone, use the right/left keys on the screen to move the player; high, ground, and head shot keys to kick the ball.

If you are playing on the desktop, use the keyboard right/left arrow keys to move the player; A key for high kick, D key for ground kick, and Up arrow key for head kick.

Your first character is fixed. You need to earn coins to unlock other characters. Each goal carries 15 Coins. The more goals you make in every match, the higher coins you will earn to avail the superpowers.

Superpowers? Let's reveal another top secret of the game too!

We also give you the option to gain special powers to beat your opponents. Want to know how?

There are 3 superpowers you can use to win matches easily.
1. Opponent Freezing Power- With this power, you can freeze your opponent for a few seconds and make your goal without any hindrance.
2. A Goalie- A goalkeeper will appear on the screen to stop your opponent from making the goals.
3. A Giant Goal- With the help of this power you can increase the size of the opponent's goal net to shoot the ball easily.

How can you avail the superpowers?
To take advantage of the powers, you need to earn coins equal to or more than 200. Once your coin count reaches 200, you will be able to avail the superpowers from the shop icon.

Sounds interesting to you? Then what are you waiting for?
Experience the legendary football experience with Football Stars!
Step into thrilling penalty shootouts as a striker or goalkeeper. Enjoy realistic gameplay and intense soccer action.

On this Dussehra Season, Freak X Apps released an interesting game which is based on the Rama's victory over the demons king Ravana. “Ram The Yodha” is a great combination of action and role-playing games(RPG). Ravan - The king of the demons is always ready with evil plans & Lord Ram on his quest to defeat the army of Lankapati Ravan. In this game, you need to kill different demons which will appear on the screen. You have to drag the bows and release them to kill demons. Each demons have different points which you can get by killing them. The best part of the game is as Lord Ram you will never be killed or attacked by the demons, but you need to save your bows as you have only limited bows to kill the demons. So, be careful & lil fast too, as the time is also running. Make sure you don't miss the chance. To fight against the most dangerous demons, you may need more powerful weapons. For this purpose, you will also get some supernatural weapons(as power) in the game to kill the demons. Apart from this, you can also get more bows by collecting the power of the bows. So, celebrate the victory of good over bad by playing the Ram the Yodha game.

Do you have match-winning skills? You are the last wicket and you have to score as much as you can to lead your team to victory. So wear your helmet & pad up to be a match-winner. Improve your batting skills & show some cool cricket shots with 'Cricket 2024'.

Pandit Vishnu Govind Jog, revered as the ‘Violin Samrat,’ - a monumental figure in 20th-century Hindustani classical music, who played a crucial role in establishing the violin as a distinguished solo instrument in the genre. His innovative approach and performances transformed the violin’s role, showcasing its vast potential and elevating its status within Hindustani classical music.

Semmangudi Radhakrishna Srinivasa Iyer, a towering figure in Carnatic music, is celebrated as one of the greatest stalwarts of the genre. Awarded the prestigious Sangeetha Kalanidhi by the Music Academy in 1947—becoming its youngest recipient—his impact on Carnatic music is enduring. Affectionately known as "Semmangudi Maama" by his disciples and hailed as the "Pitamaha, his extraordinary vocal artistry and reflects his role in shaping the landscape of modern Carnatic music.

Pandit Kumar Gandharva, renowned for his innovative and emotive approach to Hindustani classical music. Each track exemplifies Pandit Kumar Gandharva’s exceptional skill and innovative contributions to Hindustani vocal music, providing listeners with a rich and immersive experience.

Begum Akhtar, celebrated for her mastery in Ghazal, Dadra, and Thumri genres of Hindustani classical music and her significant contribution to the Ghazal traditions. Along with Ghazals, Dadras & Thumris, the volume features an insightful interview with Begum Akhtar, conducted by Acharya Brihaspati in July 2006, offering a deep dive into her musical philosophy, career, and legacy.

Step into the mesmerizing world of Pandit Pannalal Ghosh, the flutist whose music redefined Hindustani classical traditions. This collection invites you to experience his sublime mastery and the impact of his flute, providing a journey through his most enchanting and influential works.

Pandit Basavraj Rajguru born in Yaliwal, Karnataka, was a leading Hindustani vocal musician of the Kirana Gharana. Though he preferred a low-profile lifestyle, he earned significant respect and numerous awards including the Padma Bhushan.

M.S. Subbulakshmi presents the sublime artistry of one of Carnatic music’s most cherished iconic figures. Renowned for her vocal clarity and deeply emotive performances, Listen to M.S. Subbulakshmi’s interpretation, essence of her legendary style highlights her exceptional vocal skills and emotional expression through a range of compositions. Each track showcases her mastery over ragas and talas, capturing the spiritual and emotional depth of the compositions, providing listeners an enriching and immersive auditory experience.

Mallikarjun Bheemarayappa Mansur was an Indian classical singer specializing in the khyal style of the Jaipur Atrauli gharana. He received all three national Padma Awards.Mansur was well known for his command over a large number of rare ragas as well as his constant, mercurial improvisations in both melody and metre without ever losing the emotional content of the song.

An eminent musician whose name is entwined with Shehnai, Ustad Bismillah Khan was a legendary classical musician and one of the world’s best Shehnai maestro.Delve into the exquisite world of classical music with Ustad Bismillah Khan's best classical melodies.
Enjoy listening to some of the finest renderings by the Legend Manna Dey.
Enjoy listening to some of the finest renderings by the HARIPRASAD CHAURASIA

The Bank of Spain is like no other. An absolutely impenetrable bank. A bank that nobody could ever rob. There are no blueprints. No maps. No data on the vault's engineering system. It is an absolute mystery. Plus, the head of security ferociously guards the bank as if his life depended on it. This thrilling challenge ignites the curiosity of Thom, a genius determined to learn the vault's secrets and make it into the depths of the bank. The target is a long-lost treasure that will be held inside the bank for only ten days. Led by charismatic art expert Walter, the team has only ten days to prepare the heist and pull off a once-in-a-lifetime escape. Ten days to plan, but only ninety minutes to carry out that plan: the ninety minutes of the World Cup final that will draw hundreds of thousands of fans to the door of the Bank of Spain. The countdown begins.

Sanju, a humble son of a retired teacher, is captivated by the power and success of Mahendra Singh, the village head. He join the political struggle, naïve at first, but soon learns that life’s struggles demand more than ambition. As tension brews between Triveni, a strong advocate aligned with the village leader, and the anti-establishment forces, Sanju’s heart hardens with resolve. Motivated by a desire for justice, he rallies those seeking change, stepping forward as an unlikely challenger to the long-standing rule of Mahendra Singh, ready to fight for a brighter future.

After years of estrangement, Antony is compelled to seek help from his former friend Thambaan, despite the deep scars of their unresolved past. As old wounds resurface and tensions simmer, the two must confront their shared history while navigating a present fraught with danger, loyalty, and redemption.
Subhash, an Indian Army Colonel, is sent to capture a terrorist. However, the mission becomes complicated when he discovers that the terrorists are planning a political upheaval in India.

Shiva, an intelligence officer, develops a phone software that helps him track those in need of help. He sets out to save the people of hyderabad when he realises that a serial killer is on the loose.
Elite sniper Li Beiming is assigned to protect a high-profile target, but when he crosses paths with the enigmatic An Ying, his mission and heart are put to the test.
WHEN THREE NOTORIOUS CRIMINALS LOCK HORNS WITH A HOT-TEMPERED POLICE OFFICER, POTHARAJU SHANKAR, LITTLE DO THEY KNOW THAT THEY WILL END UP BEHIND BARS.
A CELEBRATED POLICE OFFICER'S RUN OF SUCCESS IS SHOCKINGLY INTERRUPTED BY V, A MYSTERIOUS KILLER, WHO SPECIFICALLY CHALLENGES HIM TO END HIS KILLING SPREE.

BHANUCHANDER, A COP GETS MURDERED AT A GUEST HOUSE. THE INVESTIGATING OFFICER VIJAY SHANKER TAKES UP THE CASE AND SUSPECTS IT TO BE A POSSIBLE HOMICIDE. WILL VIJAY AND BHANUCHANDER'S WIFE (SUHASINI) BE ABLE TO TRACK THE CRIMINALS?

The story of an average Indian family with a tradition of serving Mother India by joining the Indian Army for generations, dedicating their lives to the security of the nation. Dedicated to all the martyred soldiers of the Indian Army.
A moving story about two orphans from the 2004 tsunami who unconsciously discover a family in their new situation.

IRaH follows a powerful digital archive that falls into the wrong hands, exposing dangerous secrets. Its creators race to cover their tracks before they’re silenced, uncovering a deadly web of corruption, AI surveillance, and a global power struggle.
A fugitive gangster, an amateur guitarist planning to assassinate a politician, and a fisherman in love with an unattainable woman—three men, all named David, who are connected in an unexpected way.

Uday, a builder, is about to close an important deal but needs a large amount of money to buy the land. He borrows it from an underworld loan shark, but the money is stolen, which puts him in a serious trouble. 
At the same time, people seeking revenge on Chandra, a criminal who is now dead, turn their focus toward Uday. Trapped in danger, Uday must recover his stolen money, protect himself, and clear his name—unaware that an unexpected twist is yet to come.
An anthology of stories about the various situations encountered by different people while travelling in a cab towards their destination.

The Bank of Spain is like no other. An absolutely impenetrable bank. A bank that nobody could ever rob. There are no blueprints. No maps. No data on the vault's engineering system. It is an absolute mystery. Plus, the head of security ferociously guards the bank as if his life depended on it. This thrilling challenge ignites the curiosity of Thom, a genius determined to learn the vault's secrets and make it into the depths of the bank. The target is a long-lost treasure that will be held inside the bank for only ten days. Led by charismatic art expert Walter, the team has only ten days to prepare the heist and pull off a once-in-a-lifetime escape. Ten days to plan, but only ninety minutes to carry out that plan: the ninety minutes of the World Cup final that will draw hundreds of thousands of fans to the door of the Bank of Spain. The countdown begins.
In bustling Mumbai, pregnant Aishwarya refuses to listen to her powerful partner Dhruv. A troubled man, Jagruk, steps in to protect her, fighting his fears in a story of bravery and hope.

After years of estrangement, Antony is compelled to seek help from his former friend Thambaan, despite the deep scars of their unresolved past. As old wounds resurface and tensions simmer, the two must confront their shared history while navigating a present fraught with danger, loyalty, and redemption.

Shiva, an intelligence officer, develops a phone software that helps him track those in need of help. He sets out to save the people of hyderabad when he realises that a serial killer is on the loose.
Ravindra, an inept junior lawyer at a law firm, agrees to help a business magnate clear her father's name of murder. However, when bodies start piling up, Ravindra begins to show his true colours.

Sridhar Ranjan, a social activist, is missing in action in Majuli – the largest inhabited river island in the world. Seven years later, Sridhar is about to be officially declared dead when his friend, Abhijit Shandilya, a journalist, goes from Mumbai to Majuli in search of him. In Majuli, Abhijit finds himself to be a stranger of sorts in a place that is infested with terrorists and where both the police and the terrorists seem to be suspicious of him. His only hope is the beautiful local guide, Sudakshina. But like the unpredictable river Brahmaputra, her existence has unseen undercurrents. Will Abhijit be able to solve the mystery? Is he walking down the same path as his friend, Sridhar Ranjan? Does a similar fate await him as the river flows?
ANJALI VIKRAMADITHYAN, A CBI OFFICER, SETS OUT TO TRACK DOWN A SERIAL KILLER WHO THE POLICE CLAIM TO HAVE KILLED YEARS AGO. HOWEVER, THE INVESTIGATION BECOMES PERSONAL WHEN HE TARGETS HER FAMILY.

SAPTHAGIRI, a small-time lawyer, reopens a high-profile case in an attempt to gain fame. However, doing so pits him against Sai Kumar, a formidable opponent and one of the best lawyers in the country.

A delightfully funny comedy, Kabhi Yeh Kabhi Woh, is about the idiosyncrasies of our normal lives as seen in the lives of the protagonists. A gentle job at the sometimes humorous and bizarre interaction in human life. An ideal show for the families, Kabhi Yeh….. has realistic characters in hilarious situation, which will provide laughter every minute. In a nutshell-life is sometimes this …… A ticket to laughter and joy with malice to none.
Devadas, who suffers from fetal alcohol syndrome, must drink a certain amount of alcohol to keep himself alive. However, things take a turn when he falls in love with Suvasana.
Kya Masti Kya Dhoom is a lively, high-energy comedy about a group of friends on a wild adventure. It blends humour, drama, and vibrant performances to deliver nonstop entertainment.
AFTER HIS MOTHER'S DEATH, PREM, A YOUNG MAN, SEARCHES FOR LOVE IN EVERY WOMAN HE COMES ACROSS. HOWEVER, WHEN HE FINDS TRUE LOVE IN THEERA, THEY FACE SEVERAL CHALLENGES IN THEIR QUEST TO UNITE.
THREE BACHELORS, ANAND, SANTOSH AND PHANI, ARE IDLERS WHO TAKE LIFE AS A JOKE. HOWEVER, WHEN THEY GET ENTANGLED IN A MURDER CASE, THEIR WORLDVIEW CHANGES AND THEY STRUGGLE TO PROVE THEIR INNOCENCE.

The Divorce Party showcases the story of a crazy couple who decide to take divorce and throw a separation party. Does this party bring a U turn in their life or they take a divorce? Watch this hilarious comedy.

"The Pickle Factory" is a workplace-family drama following Mahika Khanna, a laid-off MBA graduate, who joins her grandmother's achaar business in Dehradun, navigating quirky coworkers and personal dynamics.

Shrimaan Shrimati is a legendary comedy sitcom about two middle-aged men, Keshav and Dilruba, who are infatuated with each other's wives, leading to hilarious situations as they try to impress them, while their wives outsmart them at every turn.

Mechhi being over possessive for his wife Sweety, doubts on his brother Kaala for having Illegitimate relations between them. He stays in a dilemma and attempts suicide multiple times but ends up hiring a contract killer for himself.
When Sachin falls in love with Anjali, a loving daughter, he strives to save her family who is struggling to restore honor in society due to her father's alcoholism.

A former army officer ignores a colleague’s warning and enters a barber shop owned by a terrorist’s son, stirring tension and unspoken history. He challenges the barber to a wrestling match, which ends with a surprising twist.

Young officers arrive at the Commando School. Old friends meet. Abhimanyu Rai is one of them. The General gives a pep talk. Major Narayanan gets tough. A 2-mile race brings buddies closer. Vikram Rai beats up the three of them and Abhi confesses Vikram is his elder brother.
It is the story of uniting all the princely states after freedom of india by Sardar Patel.

list.title: Swaraj--Bharat Ke Svatantrata Sangraam Ki Samagr Gaatha

description.content: In 1498, Vasco da Gama's arrival in India sparks cultural clashes and trade negotiations between the Portuguese and the vibrant Indian kingdoms, led by figures like Samoothiri the Zamorin.

Based on the short story "Baghi Di Dhee", the story follows Kishan Singh and his wife, Saran Kaur, who are imprisoned for their role in the freedom struggle. Meanwhile, their ailing 12-year-old daughter, Laaj, is left behind to fend for herself.

In this insightful talk, Pankaj Saxena introduces the Syavambodha-Shatrubodha. Framework as a powerful tool for understanding and reclaiming Hindu identity in a modern, globalized world. Syavambodha?, or self-awareness, emphasizes the importance of Hindus reconnecting with their rich cultural heritage, philosophical depth, and civilizational achievements. Shatrubodha, or awareness of external challenges, calls for a clear-eyed understanding of forces that seek to undermine or distort this identity. Through historical analysis, contemporary examples, and actionable insights, Saxena explains how this dual framework equips individuals and communities to navigate internal and external challenges with clarity and confidence. He argues that by integrating Syavambodha and Shatrubodha, Hindus can not only safeguard their traditions but also contribute meaningfully to global discourse with their unique worldview. This talk is both a call to introspection and a rallying cry for collective action, urging the audience to embrace their identity with pride and purpose.
